attributes.action: Double the area of Parliamentary Constituances thus reducing the number of MP's by half. The money saved to be directed towards provision of life enhancing drugs to all who need them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Westminster/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
